column4: Why are people surprised that breezy isn't stable/behaves weirdly/is broken. It's silly.
Well, it's like .. what, 5 DAYS OLD?   How long will it be unstable? :)
Nice, but 3 years out of date...
fyi, Debian unstable (don't take the name literally) contains many core packages that are more up-to-date than Hoary has now
